name: Popcustoms – Print on demand & dropshipping, Free Personalizer plugin
author: Popcustoms

sections.description:
POPCUSTOMS- A PRINT ON DEMAND, EMBROIDERY ON DEMAND AND FULFILLMENT COMPANY, YOUR MOST RELIABLE ONLINE BUSINESS PRINT PROVIDER.

We not only provide All-over-print products for you to add to store, but also provide personalized products that allow your shoppers to design directly from your store. No need to worry about upfront costs, inventory, production and logistics as our team does all of that for you.

With POPCUSTOMS, you’ll get products ranging from Footwear, Apparel, Bags, Home Decorations, Car Accessories to Accessories and so on. All hottest print on demand and embroidery on demand products on the market and products in line with new trends can be found here!

About Personalization

Want to let your shoppers customize products directly from your store? We can help you make it!

Auto syncs our FREE public personalized printing & embroidery products to your website; Or create mask images on your own designs easily to generate your own customizable products and sync to your site.

Auto sync your personalized orders to our end, no need to deal with print images by yourself, we’ll do the rest! Check our demo website giftscustomizer.com here.

Disclaimer

This plugins will reference popcustoms.com javascript code to support personalized designs and will display the latest news from popcustoms.com at the admin dashboard.

How does POPCUSTOMS work?

When a customer places an order on your store containing a Popcustoms product, the order will be automatically imported to our site. You’ll be notified via email to pay for those orders, and we’ll automatically print, fulfill and ship them to your customers directly! Tracking numbers will be automatically synced to your store once orders have shipped!

Why Choose POPCUSTOMS?

  • AFFORDABLE PRICES – We provide hundreds of unique products in various categories at a very competitive price!

300+ Hot sale print on demand & embroidery products

Custom Shoes, Sport Sneakers & Boots

  • High/Low Top Canvas Shoes
  • Mesh Running Shoes

All-over-print Clothing

  • All over print Men/Women Hoodie
  • All over print Men/Women Bomber Jackets

Trendy Home Decorations Items

  • Umbrella
  • Blankets
  • Duvets
  • Garden & Car Flags
  • Room Rugs

Customize Car Seat Covers, Car Floor Mats

  • Truck Decals Sticker

Backpacks & Bags

Custom Branding

  • All over print Shoebox
  • Customize Hang Tags

Print & Embroidery on Demand T-shirts, Hats & Bags

Custom Jewelry

Full Catalog

  • LIVE SHIPPING RATES – Automated live shipping rates so you are stress-free from shipping rate settings.
  • PRINT ON DEMAND + EMBROIDERY ON DEMAND – Compared with other apps, we can offer both all-over print and embroidery on demand so that your products stand out from the crowd. Gone are the days of square prints on the front of T-shirts!
  • 3D DESIGN MAKER – We now have a 3D design maker which allows you to view your design at 360°, giving you an accurate representation of how the product will look in real life.
  • REALISTIC MOCK-UPS – Superior mock-ups play a very important role in your business. It can not only help your designs look realistic and attractive, but also help generate more sales from your customers.
  • PERSONALIZATION FEATURE – Our personalization feature allows your customers to customize products by themselves.
  • BULK DESIGN – Design a whole new product range in minutes to save your time and energy.
  • WORLDWIDE SHIPPING – We have invested a lot of time in securing professional relationships with DHL, FedEx, EMS and other courier services to offer you the best and most reliable shipping routes with tracking worldwide.
  • 24/7 CUSTOMER SUPPORT – Contact us by using online chat or email!
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘popcustoms-for-woocommerce’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Popcustoms tab listed in the menu and click the “Registered at popcustoms.com” button
  4. Click Stores after logging in, find WooCommerce and click the “Connect” button
  5. Connected successfully and complete the store settings in popcustoms.com

sections.reviews:
Good choice.

By hannavandyk on May 11, 2023

A good assortment of products for an online store.I like the prices. It’s easy to make designs. I like 3D option. Amazing variety of shoes.

Excellent products and Service!

By shannajames1 on April 21, 2023

Large variety of products, great prices, and exceptional customer service. I speak with Daisy on WhatsApp often and she is very responsive and super helpful. Highly recommend!

Error 403

By Developer for wordpress sites (thepaddycaddy) on January 4, 2023

They have beautiful products but I can't get it to work, constant 403 errors. Other POD plugins work so I know it's not my site that is the problem. Support is provided over facebook messenger, which I do not use, so it's clunky to get support. They wanted to me to send screenshots but I couldn't due to it being facebook messenger. They should consider a lot of people don't use facebook anymore and trying a different chat support solution. The support they do have on chat seems overwhelmed and can't get to answers very quickly. I gave up after over 2 hours of troubleshooting. There's no really good documentation to help so unfortunately this plugin gets a low star rating from me. I do hope they fix the problems because their products look great and the pricing is very affordable.

Amazing Service

By Jay_grkn on November 8, 2022

Great plugin and great service - their products and customer services are exceptional! I also used some other print on demand companies before but their price was always high. They offer really fast service with the best available prices. Highly recommended!
